idea: We are scoping to hand-over Ambulance application that will facilitate user to book and Manage Ambulance. User will be able to book on demand Ambulance. User will be able to search Ambulance through the application by entering his location or they can directly request to book a Ambulance to the admin on behalf of them. User can select his location via geo location map or by manually typing the address further he can send a booking request to book a Ambulance and will receive a confirmation notification for the same that his request has been accepted. User will be able to track the driver's location and driver can also be able to do the same. There will be a 'Book now Use later feature' by which user can select a date & time to book a ride for later. Admin will manage the whole application.
name: Jivanvahini

idea:
Smazing, a Social Media and a Lifestyle products Market Place platform, combines the functionality like Chat: Text, Voice, Video and Group Chat along a Video Content based Social feed. 
The application offers business owners to list and promote their product offerings to the user community for either a Direct Purchase or guide them to their online shop / local store.
name: BRILVOICE INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
BrainGymJr is a child development initiative that supplements a parent’s effort to engage with children and sharpen their logic, reasoning, language and maths skills with simple real-life examples from our own environment.  We endeavour to help every child (between age 5-10 years) through a daily dose of simple and fun exercises with real-world scenarios which are age appropriate and aligned with learning objectives.

We have a PoC validation with 3 ages groups (6-7 / 8-9 /9 + years). We will soon be further customizing these exercises for children keeping in mind the nuances of their development stage despite their current age. Based on their response, we will be placing them across 15 levels of development across language, maths/logic and real world skill.

We are launching a web version, an android application and an iOS application. Children will be invited to take a simple challenge that will serve as an assessment and place them between level 1- 15 for each of the three categories respectively. They will get their daily exercise across the three categories. They will also have access to unlimited exercises for practice up to their level.
name: BRAINGYMJR EDUCATION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
A human-centered, AI-powered Nutrition Tech platform, Fitza is deeply rooted in delivering personalized & evidence based sustainable nutrition advice/ plans addressing diet related non communicable diseases and chronic ailments.

From ailment recovery goals-based lifestyle recommendations to traditional healthy recipes, the virtual intelligent nutritional coach is programed based on age old practices, user likes and dislikes, grandma recipes and natural homemade remedies with proven outcomes.

The platform is built incorporating inputs from healthcare professionals, dieticians, fitness gurus, and nutrition experts. The mission was simple – to make nutrition and well-being accessible to the masses by leveraging the power of next generation technology at scale

Having advised and consulted sports persons, fitness experts, celebrities, the health conscious, patients with chronic ailments, on nutrition and well-being, our Chief Nutritionist has impacted over 2000 lives.
name: FITZA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Biplob World Pvt. Ltd.

The brainchild of Ritika and Abhishek Talwar, Biplob World Pvt. Ltd. (BWPL) is an organization dedicated to the creation and promotion of content that educates & informs young children about:

• The importance of protecting the environment and nature

• The rich cultural heritage & history of India

We believe that stories are the best engagement format for children to learn something new. Not only do stories make the learning and discovering process more accessible to young minds, it also firmly anchors the lesson in easily recognizable situations. A lesson learnt through stories is a lesson that remains with you for life!

Our first title, ‘Adventures of Biplob the Bumblebee – Volume 1’ has been published by Penguin Random House India. Since then, 5+ volumes of this series have been launched under the Biplob World brand, besides colouring and activity books.

Biplob the Bumblebee – the Eco Warrior

Our Flagship character, Biplob is the first ever eco – friendly superhero. He lives in the countryside with his friends farmer Balram, the various flowers, Spot the Leopard, Karini the elephant and others.

In each rollicking adventure, Biplob uses his wits to come up with an eco – friendly solution to help his friends and garden and avert disaster! Not only do these tales teach basic science to children in an engaging format, they also bring out important lessons and life – skills for children.

Biplob believes that every problem has a natural, eco – friendly and sustainable solution!

These stories aim to bring home to children the importance of protecting nature, our environment and the eco – system and are suitable for children of ages from 4 to 10 years.

Detective Genghis

Written for children in the 6 to 12 age bracket, ‘Detective Genghis’ is a series of thriller novellas. The objective of these stories is to bring to life the history, heritage and culture of our country. Each story is structured such that it throws light on the truth behind places, myths and legends. Be it the true story of Krisna’s Dwarka or the legacy of Ranthambore fort, they are all interestingly weaved into a modern, easy to identify narrative or children.

The stories are set in a world inhabited and run by dogs. The main protagonist, Genghis, is an Indian Panther Hound (Gaddi Kutta), who runs a detective agency after getting an honourable discharge from the army as a colonel in military intelligence. Each thriller novella sees the intrepid detective solve a case that threatens the very existence of his world. The case itself takes children on a roller – coaster ride through the monuments and historic locations of India, giving them a taste of our rich culture and heritage. The first book in this series is slated for launch on August 2021, with a total of 20+ novellas planned over the next couple of years.

The first book in this series is scheduled for launch in August 2021

Chef Jerry

‘Chef Jerry’s pizzeria’ is a book series for children in the 6 to 10 age category. Through these heart – warming stories, children learn about empathy, integrity, friendship and temperance amongst other things. The first book in this franchise is slated for launch in July 2021. The key protagonists in this series are Jerry, the pizza chef, Addy, a 10 year old, and Avantika, his 9 – year old sister. 4 books in this franchise are slated for launch in 2021 – 22.

Besides children’s literature, Abhishek has also written two books for adults. The first, ‘PURVYAM’ is a fantasy fiction story set in pre – Ramayan India. Set to be a trilogy, Purvyam charts the journey of Abhikshana, one who is neither woman nor man, as she / he sets out to wipe out humanity from the face of earth. The first book in this trilogy is complete and slated for launch by December 2021.

‘Chronicles of a Wanderer’, the second book, is a fictionalised biography. This book is based on the life of Adesh Dhamija, a man who set out to explore the world from Madras in 1978, on a Jawa motorcycle and 500 dollars to his name. The book is slated for launch in July 2021.

Brand Extensions

BWPL has released 8 animated short films (60 to 75 seconds) featuring Biplob the Bumblebee, besides READ ALOUD sessions with author Abhishek Talwar on the BIPLOB WORLD YouTube channel. A total of 100+ pieces of content are slated for launch over the coming 12 months.

Merchandize

We are coming out with a range of merchandize featuring characters from Biplob World, which includes:

1. Apparel (Men, Women & Kids range)

2. Accessories (Masks, bandanas, mobile phone covers)

3. Household (Mugs, sippers, mats etc.)

4. Soft Toys (Biplob doll in 2 sizes and Biplob baby seat)
name: BIPLOB WORLD PRIVATE LIMITED
